title: TheLead123
author: TheLead123
content: Hello everyone,Hope all of you are healthy and doing well.  Let me introduce myself.I'm Amar, a Front-end web developer having 6+ years of experience into designing websites using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap, jQuery.Today I'm here to sell a hotel design template for an affordable price.Template is designed using HTML, CSS, JavaScript and Bootstrap 5.Template is 100% responsive on all screen devices. Check the preview below.  Buyer will get 100% support from me for lifetime   Asking price for the template is $25orBTC0.00085Buyer rights: 1. Buyer can modify the codes as per your wish.2. Buyer can remove the Unikbrushes backlink.3. Buyer can install this template on N number of site.4. Buyer can resale this template as many times as you wish.I accept payments via all crypto currencies. And online payment processors like PayPal, PerfectMoney, Payeer ,Bank transfer and UPIs(for Indians).Preview:If you have time, feel free to check out my web design portfolio: http://www.unikbrushes.comThank you for reading.  Best regards,Amar
